sourcesContent:
<template>
	<svg :width="width" :height="height">
		<path :d="linePath" stroke="#4a90e2" stroke-width="2" fill="none" />
		<circle
			v-for="(point, index) in points"
			:key="index"
			:cx="point.x"
			:cy="point.y"
			r="2"
			fill="#4a90e2" />
	</svg>
</template>

<script setup>
	import { computed } from "vue";

	const props = defineProps({
		data: {
			type: Object,
			default: () => ({ values: [], labels: [] })
		},
		width: {
			type: Number,
			default: 120
		},
		height: {
			type: Number,
			default: 60
		}
	});

	const normalizedValues = computed(() => {
		if (props.data.values.length === 0) return [];
		const min = Math.min(...props.data.values);
		const max = Math.max(...props.data.values);
		const range = max - min || 1;

		return props.data.values.map(
			value => props.height - 10 - ((value - min) / range) * (props.height - 20)
		);
	});

	const points = computed(() => {
		return normalizedValues.value.map((y, i) => ({
			x: i * (props.width / (normalizedValues.value.length - 1 || 1)),
			y
		}));
	});

	const linePath = computed(() => {
		if (points.value.length < 2) return "";
		return `M${points.value.map(p => `${p.x},${p.y}`).join(" L")}`;
	});
</script>
